languages.text: Данный тип урона наносят {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатели{/g}, плазменные {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} и детонация торпед (как при промахе с помощью {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}неконтактного взрывателя{/g}, так и при ручном подрыве).

Blast attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).

traits.locale_text: Energy attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).

languages.text: Stoßangriffe beinhalten Angriffe mit {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffen{/g}, Plasma-{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} und Torpedo-Explosionen ({g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g} und manuelle Zündung).
languages.original_text: Blast attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).

traits.locale_text: Energie-Angriffe beinhalten Angriffe mit Lanzenwaffen, Plasma- {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} und Torpedo-Explosionen (gilt für Auslösung per {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g} und manuelle Detonation).

languages.text: Les attaques explosives incluent les attaques utilisant des {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} et des {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} à plasma ainsi que les explosions de torpilles (qu'il s'agisse de tirs manqués suivis d'une explosion déclenchée par {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}fusée de proximité{/g} ou d'explosions déclenchées manuellement).
languages.original_text: Blast attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).

traits.locale_text: Les attaques énergétiques incluent les attaques menées à l'aide de lances et de {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} à plasma ainsi que les explosions de torpilles (qu'il s'agisse de tirs manqués suivis d'une explosion sur une {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}fusée de proximité{/g} ou d'explosions déclenchées manuellement).

languages.text: 爆破攻击包括{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}、等离子{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}与鱼雷引爆造成的攻击（既包括未命中目标时{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}引爆，也包括手动引爆）。
languages.original_text: Blast attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).

traits.locale_text: 爆破攻击包括{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}、等离子{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}与鱼雷引爆造成的攻击（既包括未命中目标时{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}引爆，也包括手动引爆）。

languages.original_text: Energy attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).

languages.text: Los ataques de explosión incluyen los realizados con {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armas de lanza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} de plasma y detonaciones de torpedo (tanto con un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g} al fallar como al detonarlos manualmente).
languages.original_text: Blast attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de energía incluyen los realizados con lanzas, {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} de plasma y detonaciones de torpedo (tanto con un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g} al fallar como al detonarlos manualmente).

languages.text: ブラスト攻撃は、{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}によるもの、プラズマ{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}および魚雷爆発（{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}でのミスや手動起爆いずれの場合でも）によるものがある。
languages.original_text: Blast attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).

traits.locale_text: エネルギー攻撃は、ランスウェポンによるもの、プラズマ{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}および魚雷爆発（{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}でのミスや手動起爆いずれの場合でも）によるものがある。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Mızrak silahları{/g}, plazma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro topları{/g} ve torpidolarca (hem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}yakınlık fünyesi{/g} kullanılarak ıskalandığında hem de manuel olarak patlatıldığında) yapılan saldırılar patlama saldırısı kategorisine girer.
languages.original_text: Blast attacks include those made with {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}, plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, and torpedo detonations (both on misses via a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g} and when detonated manually).
